hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select d.F_DIC_NAME, substr(t.f_worktime,length(t.f_worktime)-1,length(t.f_worktime))||'-'||t.F_MAT_NAME||'-'||t.f_workorder_code from T_BAT_WORKORDER t,V_BAT_JBGROUP_EQU d where t.F_WORKORDER_TYPE = ? and t.F_PRODUCE_DATE >= to_char(sysdate-1,'YYYYMMDD') and t.F_PRODUCE_DATE <= to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD') and t.f_workorder_state='10' and t.f_process=d.F_ESB_CODE and t.f_sys_flag='1' order by t.F_PROCESS,t.F_WORKORDER_CODE

select d.F_DIC_NAME, substr(t.f_worktime,length(t.f_worktime)-1,length(t.f_worktime))||'-'||t.F_MAT_NAME||'-'||t.f_workorder_code from T_BAT_WORKORDER t,v_bat_cxjtgroup_equ d where t.F_WORKORDER_TYPE = ? and t.F_PRODUCE_DATE >= to_char(sysdate-1,'YYYYMMDD') and t.F_PRODUCE_DATE <= to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD') and t.f_workorder_state='10' and t.f_process=d.F_ESB_CODE and t.f_sys_flag='1' order by t.F_PROCESS,t.F_WORKORDER_CODE
